name: Batu Moju (Bean Pickle)
description: Sweet and sour green bean pickle
instructions: In same oil, add mustard seeds
Add curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
cultural_notes: Popular side dish that pairs well with rice
description_sinhala: පැණිරස හා ඇඹුල් කොළ බෝංචි අච්චාරු
description_tamil: இனிப்பு மற்றும் புளிப்பு பச்சை பீன் ஊறுகாய்
cultural_notes_sinhala: සහල් සමඟ හොඳින් සම්බන්ධ වන ජනප්‍රිය අතුරු කෑමක්
cultural_notes_tamil: அரிசியுடன் நன்றாக இணைக்கும் பிரபலமான சைட் டிஷ்
